data.enText: a lake of salt water that is separated from the sea by a reef or an area of rock or sand
a small area of fresh water near a lake or river
data.chText: （湖泊或江河附近的）小片淡水域，小淡水湖

data.enText: an artificial area built to hold waste water before it is treated at a sewage works

means: (湖泊或江河附近的)小片淡水域，小淡水湖

tr: a body of water cut off from a larger body by a reef of sand or coral

value.def: A lagoon is an area of calm sea water that is separated from the ocean by a line of rock or sand.
